  • Reference

Sampler

Source: R/Sampler.R

Random sampler for an arbitrary ParamSet.

Sampler

Format

R6Class object. Abstract base class.

Public members / active bindings

  • param_set :: ParamSet
    Domain / support of the distribution we want to sample from.

Public methods

  • new(param_set)
    ParamSet -> self
    Abstract, only inheriting subclasses call this. Param set is cloned on construction.

  • sample(n)
    integer(1) -> Design
    Sample n values from the distribution.

Private methods / Internals

  • .sample(n)
    integer(1) -> data.table
    Inheriting sublcasses have to implement thus, called from sample()

See also

Other Sampler: SamplerHierarchical, SamplerJointIndep, SamplerUnif
